markets.location: Old Delhi, adjacent to Red Fort
markets.name: Chandni Chowk
markets.speciality: Historic 17th‑century bazaar famous for street food, textiles, jewelry, and spices

markets.name: Dilli Haat
markets.speciality: Open‑air craft bazaar offering regional handicrafts, traditional food stalls, and cultural performances

markets.name: Khan Market
markets.speciality: Upscale market known for imported snacks, cafés, and boutique shopping

markets.name: Sarojini Nagar
markets.speciality: Cheap designer clothing and surplus export‑quality brands

markets.name: Connaught Place
markets.speciality: Colonial‑style circular market with shops, restaurants, and easy metro access

markets.name: Janpath
markets.speciality: Bargain shopping for handicrafts, accessories, and souvenirs

markets.name: Khari Baoli
markets.speciality: Asia's largest spice market, famed for aromatic spices and ingredients

monuments.name: Red Fort
monuments.speciality: 17th‑century Mughal fortress, UNESCO World Heritage Site

monuments.name: Jama Masjid
monuments.speciality: Grand mosque that can accommodate up to 25,000 worshippers

monuments.name: Qutub Minar
monuments.speciality: 73 m brick minaret, UNESCO World Heritage Site, blend of Indian and Islamic architecture

monuments.name: India Gate
monuments.speciality: 42 m war memorial and popular public gathering space

monuments.name: Humayun's Tomb
monuments.speciality: Persian‑style mausoleum with gardens, UNESCO World Heritage Site

monuments.name: Lotus Temple
monuments.speciality: Contemporary Baháʼí House of Worship with distinctive flower‑like architecture

activities.description: Experience pottery making and ceramics trails in Delhi and nearby areas like Khurja and Assam. Includes hands‑on workshops, museum demonstrations, and dedicated pottery retreats.
activities.name: Pottery Making

activities.description: Visit iconic Delhi landmarks such as the Red Fort, Humayun’s Tomb, Qutab Minar, Jama Masjid, and other UNESCO World Heritage sites.
activities.name: Historical Tours

activities.description: Participate in block printing, weaving, and other handicraft workshops that showcase India’s artistic heritage.
activities.name: Cultural Workshops

activities.description: Explore the Crafts Museum in Pragati Maidan where artisans demonstrate pottery, embroidery, weaving, carving, and more.
activities.name: Crafts Museum Visit

activities.description: Join multi‑day pottery retreats (e.g., Aura Pottery) offering both hand‑building and wheel‑throwing sessions for beginners and enthusiasts.
activities.name: Pottery Retreats

activities.description: While not in Delhi, India offers trekking in Ladakh, paragliding in Himachal, river rafting in Rishikesh, and scuba diving in the Andaman Islands.
activities.name: Adventure Sports (outside Delhi)

famous_activities.availability: Available in Delhi and nearby regions
famous_activities.name: Pottery
